channel.title: Throne of lies Survey For the state of the game
channel.description:
Just a quick survey to see what players think about the current state of the game, will add more if you want?
P.S. Do not put your results in the comments I want players to choose based on their own opinion alone, but if you want to say how bad the survey is then you can ;)
https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/5S6Z6G2
